scripts.dev: cross-env IS_ELECTRON=1 START_HOT=1 npm run start-renderer-dev
scripts.start-main-dev: cd ../../ && cross-env IS_ELECTRON=1 HOT=1 NODE_ENV=development electron -r @babel/register --require @babel/polyfill ./src/electron/main
scripts.build-main: cd ../../ && cross-env IS_ELECTRON=1 NODE_ENV=production babel-node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --progress --config webpack/electron/main.js --colors && cd -
scripts.build-renderer: cd ../../ && cross-env IS_ELECTRON=1 NODE_ENV=production babel-node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --progress --config webpack/electron/renderer.prod.js --colors && cd -
scripts.package: cd ../../ && npm run build:electron && build --publish never && cd -
scripts.package-all: cd ../../ && npm run build:electron && build -mwl && cd -
scripts.package-linux: cd ../../ && DEBUG_PROD=true npm run build:electron && build --linux && cd -
scripts.package-win: cd ../../ && npm run build:electron && build --win --x64 && cd -
